name: Battle Ranker in Another World
about:
You were about to be surrounded and killed by a gang, but were taken to another world just in time.
In an unknown space, the beautiful MC. Jenny Pink offers you a choice.

Return home by taking part in a battle in Otherworld, or die!
Will you choose death, or will you choose to fight?

You decide to fight, vowing for vengeance.




Idle RPG with quick advancements! Level up and grow even when idling!
Feel the joy of progress without the hassle!üòä


Jenny Pink will support your progress throughout the battles in Otherworld.
Level up Jenny and enjoy life with her in Otherworld.üòç


Communicate and compete with other users summoned to this world!
There can only be one winner! Be the top ranker in Otherworld!üëç


The battle has already started. Check out your powers through PvP with other users!


Glamorous, captivating monsters are waiting for you in the dungeon!üò±


The only thing you need to do is enjoy!

name: Midas Merge: Gold Match Games
about:
Escape to the magical fantasy world of Midas Merge filled with wonder and mystery! Someone shattered King Midas‚Äô magical crown, and darkness has shrouded the land and its fantastical creatures!

Can you fix Midas‚Äô crown and repair his Gardens of Gold? Can you merge your way through each garden to restore beauty to the land and find the missing Crown Jewels?

Midas, Liya and all of the creatures are counting on you to restore their home!

YOU WILL‚Ä¶
Discover and evolve new mystical creatures, complete fun quests and merge your way through challenging puzzles to bring the gardens back to life!

DISCOVER and EXPLORE the Gardens of Gold!
- There‚Äôs always something new to uncover! Put your merging skills to the test and hatch eggs to discover rare and magical creatures!
- Evolve and nurture creatures to complete your collection!
- Find the wonders of this magical world by merging to discover uncommon, rare, and legendary items as you farm your garden!
- Magical riches and treasures are waiting to be collected, claimed and added to your garden!

MERGE and MATCH to restore their home!
- Leverage your merge mastery to drag and match 3 (or more) of a kind objects to evolve them!
- Grow your creature collection and they will tend to your garden and harvest items for you to merge and play with.
- Farm fruits from various shrubs to create Sunbursts.
- Tap Sunbursts for explosions of Sun that banish the darkness to unlock, uncover, and restore the Gardens of Gold!

PLAY a mini-game in the Vault of Riches for treasure!
- Visit the Vault and you might win some of Midas' famed prizes!
- Merge items within the Vault to make wonderful discoveries!
- Earn items to take back to your Gardens!

COMPLETE QUESTS to hatch your Guardian Creature!
- Become a merge master and put your skills to the test by completing challenging puzzles!
- Claim rewards for completing quests and grow your Gardens!
- Hatch and grow your Guardian Creature to discover GOLDEN EGGS and other rare treasures.

DECORATE and make the Garden your own!
- Bring your garden to life by merging objects such as charmstones, coins, shrubs, treasures, plants, and more!
- Help your creatures and earn hearts to repair the destruction Nyx caused in the gardens. Restore landmarks in your garden and earn special rewards!
- Drag, merge, match, and organize items the way you want and bring an end to the darkness plaguing the Gardens!

Adventure awaits and the creatures are depending on you to restore their home! DOWNLOAD NOW and start playing Midas Merge today ‚Äì a cherished puzzle game by creators that have brought joy to millions of players across the globe!

name: EndCycle VS (Closed Beta)
about:
WARNING: THIS IS A CLOSED BETA! THIS APP DOES NOT WORK UNLESS YOU HAVE BOUGHT THE ENDCYCLE VS PREMIUM VERSION (CURRENTLY UNAVAILABLE)

A full version of the game is available on Steam.

Build your deck, choose your fighter and take on ever evolving enemies in this
epic roguelike adventure. With over 4,000 combinations, you can battle against the oncoming Noise or take the fight online.

In EndCycle VS the world is standing on the brink of war! A rotating city, purple ice-deserts, mysterious worlds built with data‚Ä¶ It is a wild world with new challenges every day. Two teenagers find themselves in the middle of the biggest conflict this world has ever faced.

The Crimson Force and the Azure Shield have dedicated their lives to advancing the human race as we know it‚Ä¶ but who will win and will they drag the world down with them?

===== INVENTIVE DECKBUILDING =====
Create a unique playstyle with thousands of custom attacks!

===== ROGUELIKE ADVENTURE AWAITS =====
Vanquish your foes throughout an increasingly challenging world,
choose different cards and even different characters as you try to break the
Cycle!

===== TAKE YOUR STRATEGY TO ITS LIMITS =====
Battle it out against waves of enemies to perfect your build, before
taking the fun online and testing yourself against other players!


Will you have what it takes to beat your enemies and end the cycle?

name: Red Desert : Idle team RPG
about:
Embark on an epic desert journey with RED: Rescue Eternal Desert, the ultimate adventure runner and RPG hybrid inspired by the hit animation series! Explore vast deserts, battle fierce enemies, and unlock powerful characters, pets, and equipment to create the ultimate team of heroes. Are you ready to face the challenges of the Eternal Desert and uncover its secrets?

üåü DYNAMIC ADVENTURE RUNNER: Run, jump, and fight your way through various terrains and levels as you progress through the thrilling story of RED: Rescue Eternal Desert. Encounter unique challenges and overcome obstacles to reach the ultimate goal!

üî• AWESOME HEROES & EQUIPMENT: Discover and collect a diverse roster of characters with unique abilities and customize them with awesome costumes and equipment for extra flair.

üêæ COLLECT PETS: Tame and train powerful pets to aid you in your adventure. These loyal companions will provide valuable support in your battles against the desert's most fearsome foes.

üè∞ EXPLORE DUNGEONS: Delve into mysterious dungeons filled with treasures and dangers. Conquer these perilous realms to obtain rare and valuable rewards that will boost your team's power!

ü§∫ ARENA BATTLES: Test your skills and prove your mettle in intense PvP arena battles. Let the world see how strong you are!

üåü DAILY EVENTS & QUESTS: Stay engaged with a constant stream of events, quests, and challenges that will keep you coming back for more. There's never a dull moment in RED: Rescue Eternal Desert!

Don't miss out on the adventure of a lifetime! Download RED: Rescue Eternal Desert now and experience a thrilling, action-packed journey through a vibrant and mysterious world. Are you brave enough to uncover the desert's secrets and become a true hero?

Thank you!

name: Shapez
about:
*Pre-register the game now! Get it at a special 10% off launch price! Try it for free until level 7*
Buying the game gives you access to the full version, but you can also play for free first and decide later!

Do you like automation games? Then you are in the right place!

shapez is a relaxed game in which you have to build factories for the automated production of geometric shapes. As the level increases, the shapes become more and more complex, and you have to spread out on the infinite map.
And as if that wasn't enough, you also have to produce exponentially more to satisfy the demands - the only thing that helps is scaling! While you only have to process shapes at the beginning, you will later have to color them - by extracting and mixing colors!

FEATURES
- Create a unique and complex abstract shapes factory in a satisfying way.
- Unlock new devices, upgrade them, and optimize your factory by experimenting with diverse tools.
- Develop your system the way you want: each problem can have many solutions.
- Enjoy an elegant, minimalist and readable art direction.
- Go at your own pace with an approachable gameplay and a soothing soundtrack.

CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE
- Revamped interface
- Game Center achievements
- Cloud Save - Share your progress between Android devices

If you run into a problem, please contact us at https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/12-playdigious/ with as much information as possible on the issue.
